items.name: Loath Curio
explicitMods: 2% chance to receive additional Abyss items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
1% chance to receive additional Metamorph items when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
6% chance in Heists for Orbs of Alteration to drop as Chaos Orbs instead
1% chance in Heists for Basic Currency drops to be Duplicated
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
